name: Dell XPS 16 (2025)
description: Premium Windows laptop with 16-inch 4K OLED display, Intel Core Ultra 9, and RTX 4070. Stunning design with haptic touchpad and excellent build quality.

reviews.review_text: OLED display is breathtaking. Best laptop screen.
Finally a Windows laptop that rivals MacBook quality.
Keyboard is excellent but touchpad takes adjustment.
